content.question: Which of the following types of releases of greenhouse gases from an anthropogenic source is shown in the diagram?

choices.label: Volcanic eruptions emitting <math alttext="C O 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>C</mtext><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> into the atmosphere
Release of <math alttext="V O Cs" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>VOCs</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> from tree species and motor vehicles into the atmosphere

Industrial and agricultural practices releasing <math alttext="C H 4" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>C</mtext><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> into the atmosphere

Evaporation of surface water increasing <math alttext="H 2 O" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mtext>O</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> vapor in the atmosphere

content.answer: Industrial and agricultural practices releasing <math alttext="C H 4" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>C</mtext><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> into the atmosphere

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain how environmental concepts and processes represented visually relate to broader environmental issues.
